docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., July 8 -- Secretary General Dag Hammarskjold said today that the forthcoming United Nations atoms-for-peace parley might open the way for removing "the threat of the atomic bomb."

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 10 (UP) -- Angel G. Borlenghi, former Argentine Minister of Justice and Interior, disclaimed today any responsibility for the anti - Catholic measures taken during the last eight months in Argentina.

docs.snippet: FORT WAYNE, Ind., July 16 -- Beverly Hanson captured medal play honors today in the $6,000 national Ladies Professional Golf Association tournament with a fifty-four-hole total of 220, five under par.
